meanings.definition: The act of deuterating or making something secondary.
meanings.sent1: Her deuterations of the original design improved its functionality.
meanings.sent2: The deuterations in the story added depth to the characters.
meanings.sent3: The deuterations of the cake recipe made it even tastier.
meanings.sent4: His deuterations of the song turned it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The deuterations of the garden transformed it into a paradise.

meanings.definition: The process of undergoing a secondary development or transformation.
meanings.sent1: The deuterations of the company led to increased profits.
meanings.sent2: After many deuterations, the project finally succeeded.
meanings.sent3: The deuterations of the old building made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: Her deuterations of the routine brought excitement to her life.
meanings.sent5: The deuterations of the forest over time were remarkable.
